SELECT COUNT(*) FROM out_schedule_per_product -- 이후 작업 분기 일어남
WHERE
out_schedule_cd LIKE '%${keyword}%'
out_schedule_qty LIKE '%${keyword}%'
remarks LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT * FROM out_schedule_product
WHERE
os.out_schedule_cd LIKE '%${keyword}%'
c.buisness_no LIKE '%${keyword}%'
c.cust_name LIKE '%${keyword}%'
p.product_cd LIKE '%${keyword}%'
p.product_name LIKE '%${keyword}%'
os.out_date LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ospp.out_schedule_qty LIKE '%${keyword}%'
out_not_qty LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ospp.out_qty LIKE '%${keyword}%'
os.remarks LIKE '%${keyword}%'
LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}

SELECT out_schedule_cd, business_no, cust_name, product_cd, product_name, out_date, out_schedule_qty, out_not_qty, out_qty, remarks FROM out_schedule_product
WHERE out_schedule_cd = #{out_schedule_cd}
mapper.update: UPDATE out_schedule os , client c , out_schedule_per_product ospp , product p , stock s SET os.OUT_DATE = #{out_date}, ospp.OUT_SCHEDULE_QTY = #{out_schedule_qty}, ospp.OUT_QTY = #{out_qty}, os.REMARKS = #{remarks} WHERE os.OUT_SCHEDULE_CD = #{out_schedule_cd} AND os.BUSINESS_NO = c.BUSINESS_NO AND os.OUT_SCHEDULE_CD = ospp.OUT_SCHEDULE_CD AND p.PRODUCT_CD = ospp.PRODUCT_CD AND s.STOCK_CD = ospp.STOCK_CD
